content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our customers, shareholders and stakeholders expect and deserve the highest level of ethics and integrity from everyone at EPAM. It is highly important that we meet and exceed their expectations. This will allow us to build trust and respect relationships. Please find a time and look on IHS Markit Policy documents to make sure they are in line with EPAM's values and your personal
